title: Textile, 1920–30
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: block print on plain weave
description: Polychrome block print on linen. Visually, two layers of patterning. Background light tan-gold with three darker tan stripes patterned alternately by scrolling vine in brown; Greek key in brown or abstract flower and vine in brown. Top layer - serpentine branch with large blue flower supports, large red parrot and hanging yellow basket with a large lavender flower and green leaves. Pattern repeat - half drop. Condition: soiled

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1920–30.
1920–30. Medium: linen
Technique: block print on plain weave. Gift of Mrs. Germaine Little. 1968-110-51.
